fields.label: Facebook Share Image
fields.name: fb_share_image
fields.instructions: This image will be used when someone shares a link to the site via Facebook. The image must be exactly 1200 x 630 pixels according to Facebook guidelines. You can preview how the image will look via this tool from Facebook. If you upload a new image and the tool still displays the old one, find the "Scrape Again" button, and the new one should load.

fields.label: Twitter Share Image
fields.name: twitter_share_image
fields.instructions: This image will be used when someone shares a link to the site via Twitter. The image must be exactly 1024 x 512 pixels according to Twitter guidelines. You can preview how the image will look via this tool from Twitter.

fields.label: Share Card Title
fields.name: share_title
fields.instructions: In addition to the images uploaded above, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media sites will also add some text to the share card. The text consists of a title and subtitle. You can customize the title text here. The default text for this field is "Pono Ono"

fields.label: Share Card Subtitle
fields.name: share_subtitle
fields.instructions: You can customize the subtitle text for the share card here. The default subtitle text is "Righteous Poke."
